knitr::opts_chunk$set(fig.width=6, fig.height=6, echo=F)

suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(googleVis))
options(gvis.plot.tag='chart')
require('reshape2')

#project.id <- 'modeling.sirius'
file.metrics <- paste("", project.id, "_ci_metrics.csv", sep="")
metrics <- read.csv(file=file.metrics, header=T)

jobs <- data.frame(unlist(c('BUILDS_SUCCESS', 'BUILDS_FAILED')), unlist(metrics[1,c('CI_BUILDS_SUCCESS', 'CI_BUILDS_FAILED')]))
  
p <- gvisPieChart(jobs, 
                  options = list(
                    title=paste("GitLab CI Builds for ", project.id, sep=""),
                    colors="['green', 'red']",
                    width=450, height=320,
                    pieHole= 0.4))

print(p, 'chart')
